sourcesContent:
<template>
 
   <MovieCard :영화정보="영화정보"/>
   
   
 
  
</template>

<script> 
import axios from 'axios'
import MovieCard from './components/MovieCard.vue'

export default {
  
  name: 'App',
  data(){
  return {
     영화정보 : {
       title : '',
       released : '',
       genre : '',
       writer : '',
       
     },
  }
 
  },
  created(){
 axios.get('http://www.omdbapi.com/?i=tt3896198&apikey=fac1af98').then( 결과 => {
  this.영화정보.title += 결과.data.Title; // 영화 제목
  this.영화정보.movieReleased = 결과.data.Released; // 영화 출시일
  this.영화정보.movieGenre = 결과.data.Genre; // 영화 장르
  this.영화정보.movieWriter = 결과.data.Writer; // 영화 등장인물
  console.log(결과)
  })
  },
  
  components: { 
    MovieCard
    },
 
}
 


  

</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
